title: Black Adam
description: A slave-turned-god, Teth-Adam (Dwayne Johnson) breaks free of his prison and fights to save his homeland from an ancient evil.

title: Bodies Bodies Bodies
description: A group of rich friends find their party in a remote mansion taking a horrifying turn when one of them turns into a sadistic killer.

title: Top Gun: Maverick
description: Set 30 years after the events of `Top Gun` (1986), the sequel hinges on Captain Pete Mitchell`s (Tom Cruise) attempts to come to terms with his past, while training his friend`s son (Miles Teller) for a dangerous mission.

title: Jingle Vingle
description: Vicky gets an over-paying internship to shoot videos that connect Christmas to cake. But as he takes his journey with Natasha and his brother Jay, he finds theres a lot more to it.

title: Sohorer Upokotha
description: Based on Badal Sarkar`s play, `Baki Itihash` (1965), the Bengali film `Sohorer Upokotha` exposes the deteriorating moral fabric of Indian society.

title: Padachonte Kadhakal
description: This Malayalam anthology brings to life four stories that explore humanity`s relationship with God.

title: The Rise of Hero
description: In Guangzhou, the conservative court plans to abort the Studying Abroad Campaign. Huang Fei Hong, who aspires to study abroad, must fight the court led by Eunuch Hai to fulfill his dream.

title: Matchless Mulan
description: During the Northern Wei dynasty, the Rouran army invades the border, triggering the battle. Mulan disguises herself as a man and goes to battlefield for her sick father.

title: Unhuman
description: A class of high school students are forced to run for their lives, when a killer begins hunting them for sport.

title: Happy Valley, Series 2
description: Struggling with the pain of her daughter`s death, police sergeant Catherine Cawood puts a team of officers together to solve tough cases in their small town.
